response.overview: A new Sun documentary into vile presenter Huw Edwards' sickening behaviour shows how he sent a series of controlling and abusive messages to a young man, who was sending him sexual images in return for payments of tens of thousands of pounds.  The exchanges reveal Edwards's secret Jekyll and Hyde character as he switches between repeatedly telling his victim that he loves him - before viciously abusing him in foul-mouthed tirades.  Edwards also gives the young man instructions on using PayPal and a Monzo bank account so he can send him cash.
response.tagline: Vile messages, relentless abuse & a shocking cover-up - Huw Edwards’ depravity exposed in Sun doc
response.title: Huw Edwards: Unmasked

results.name: Vile messages, relentless abuse & a shocking cover-up - Huw Edwards’ depravity exposed in Sun doc
